Tom Hanks popularly known as Thomas Jeffrey Hanks is an American actor and producer. As of 2023, Tom Hanksâs net worth is $400 million. He is one of the most prominent and recognized cinema actors globally, acknowledged as an American cultural icon for his humorous and tragic parts.

His films have made over $4.9 billion in North America and over $9.96 billion globally, making him the fourth highest-grossing actor in the country. Hanks achieved prominence with prominent performances in a succession of critically acclaimed comedic films, including Splash (1984), Bachelor Party (1984), etc.

Tom Hanks Wiki/Biography

Born on 9 July 1956, Tom Hanksâs age is 66 Years Old as of 2023. He was born and brought up in a rich-class Catholic and Mormon family from Concord, California, the United States. He holds an American-Greek by nationality and has his belief in the Catholic-Mormon religions.

Tom Hanks Childhood Pic

He completed his early education at the John Swett Elementary School, and later at Chabot College in Concord, California, United States.

He later enrolled himself at the California State University, Sacramento, the United States from where he completed his higher education. From the very beginning of his childhood, he was very much interested in acting, and other co-curricular activities rather than studying.
